author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

This turns the json file created by edmModuleAllocAnalyzer into a file that shows memory usage via the chrome trace format.

#### PR validation:

Tested using an ModuleAllocMonitor generated file for workflow 16834.0 step2 and 4 threads.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1678
title: Added edmModuleAllocJsonToTracer.py
